showScoreExcerpt:
"It still needs a greater focus on details of the couple's amazing life story, perseverance and achievements...It's a guarantee audiences will enjoy the amazing and vibrant choreography and splashy dance numbers...It's easy to praise and cheer on the cast leads of 'On Your Feet!'...Audiences who catch 'On Your Feet' won't be disappointed and certain to leave smiling with the gift of music, faith and life's passions."
